abstract: The United States attorney investigating leaks to the media has been involved in phone cases before.
snippet: The United States attorney investigating leaks to the media has been involved in phone cases before.
lead_paragraph: Last week’s disclosure by Ronald C. Machen Jr., the United States attorney for the District of Columbia, that his office had secretly seized telephone records of Associated Press reporters as part of a leak investigation surprised and shocked many people.

headline.main: U.S. Attorney in Phone Leaks Has Seen Both Sides
headline.print_headline: U.S. Attorney in Phone Leaks Has Seen Both Sides
